title: The Quilting Guardian: The Adventures of Sue Kelly
summary: Sue Kelly, a devout 37-year-old who enjoys praying and quilting, discovers she can weave protective shields from quilts, using them to cover her community from various menaces throughout a dramatic week.
summaryGerman: Sue Kelly, eine fromme 37-Jährige, die gerne betet und Quilts herstellt, entdeckt, dass sie aus Quilts Schutzschilde weben kann, die sie verwendet, um ihre Gemeinde eine Woche lang vor verschiedenen Bedrohungen zu schützen.
summaryDutch: Sue Kelly, een devote 37-jarige die van bidden en quilten houdt, ontdekt dat ze beschermende schilden uit quilts kan weven, die ze gebruikt om haar gemeenschap een week lang te beschermen tegen verschillende gevaren.
summaryFrench: Sue Kelly, une dévouée de 37 ans qui aime prier et faire des quilts, découvre qu'elle peut tisser des boucliers protecteurs à partir de quilts, qu'elle utilise pour protéger sa communauté de diverses menaces tout au long d'une semaine dramatique.

story.text: Sue Kelly begins her week with a quiet prayer session at dawn, but soon discovers her quilts radiate a mysterious energy. She experiments and realizes she can form protective barriers.
Encouraged by her newfound powers, Sue spends the day crafting a special quilt. By evening, she successfully uses it to shield her neighbor’s house from a falling tree during a storm.
Intrigued by the potential of her powers, Sue tries a more ambitious project: a quilt large enough to cover the local park. It shields children from an unexpected hailstorm.
Sue holds a small gathering at her house to share her quilting skills and secret. The attendees are supportive but bewildered by the demonstration.
Rumors of Sue’s powers spread through town. A local journalist interviews her, eager to understand the source of her abilities. Sue emphasizes the importance of faith and community.
A crisis unfolds as a fire breaks out near downtown. Sue quickly sews a fire-resistant quilt, dramatically draping it over the endangered area to stifle the flames.
Reflecting on her week, Sue spends the day at church, praying and offering thanks for her abilities. She vows to keep using her gifts to protect her community.

ending: Thus ends a week in the life of Sue Kelly, whose divine patchwork became her town's shield.
moral: Embrace unique gifts; they may serve a higher purpose.
